snippet: The Senate Judiciary Committee on Thursday approved legislation to provide greater protections against fines or imprisonment for reporters who refuse to identify confidential sources.
abstract: Senate Judiciary Committee approves legislation to provide greater protections against fines or imprisonment for reporters who refuse to identify confidential sources.
lead_paragraph: The Senate Judiciary Committee on Thursday approved legislation to provide greater protections against fines or imprisonment for reporters who refuse to identify confidential sources.

headline.main: Senate Committee Approves Protections for Journalists
headline.print_headline: Senate Committee Approves Protections For Journalists
